tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Good Part:
Doctors are good and experienced. They gave ample time to understand the symptoms and what I had to say. They explained in detail causes and possible issues. X ray dept was good and gave me X ray report within 20-30 mins.

Bad Part:
1. They charge Rs 50 for registration details. This is wrong because registration of patient is done so that hospital can have a centralized information/Database. Now it's totally wrong for them to charge patient for this as it's to improve hospital processes.
2. Waiting: My appointment was at 12 noon and I met the doctor at 1:20 pm, that is waiting time of approx 90 mins on working day. 
3. Hospital needs to improve the customer handling big time as these delays are not acceptable. Need to have better processes and patiently needs to be exactly told where next department is and what is the next process, patient shouldn't be left to wonder about the next steps.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
With all the respect to Doctor 

He Initially  talk to my mother with great respect.  He understood the reason behind bone and muscle pain. He understood the symptoms of the patient.
He provided required treatment to her. This is my review after 3 days of treatment. 

But I have opinion sir,

When I saw reviews in Google regarding hospital there are couple reviews which describe negative about hospital . I have encountered the same . As you are serving to huge no patients in your hospital. It is quiet difficult to  attend those patients by Attenders which is making the people think they are ignorant in hospital. It could be bring effective supervision of Attending Patients and directing them or please Increase the Patients Attending Staff in Hospital.

tags: Wait time,
review: I cannot say recommendation yes or no because i did not met him, we were planned to visit doctor as per our booking time that is 11.40 am but the hospital receptionist by 10am called and told me to come early before 11 am otherwise you cannot meet doctor after 11 am. if any changes in doctor timings at least they should inform us early 2 hour prior, they should understand the traffic and patient condition, also i called back to the same number 3, 4 times to request some more time since our home was little far from hospital but number was busy and i could not tell.

tags: None
review: Doctor Chandrasekar's  professional and pleasant manner immediately puts one at ease.  I really appreciated that he did not prescribe anything beyond that which was absolutely necessary.

tags: None
review: Casualty people treats today very bad.. Dr harsha  recommend  to go casualties take nebulization  but I slept there 20 mns no coming to my bed..nd end she told only we treat emergency  people...her talks are very rude.. so I walkd  out.. our whole family coming that hospital.. very cheap mentality.. treating.. nd only 2 patients  at casualty. . Very bad.. sir.. every one there  told sir.. you.. hope as a position your sitting taking immidiate  action. . Is it people tree or money  tree we are confused. ..take immidiate  action  who is not working  on duty..

tags: None
review: He was very kind and courteous. He checked properly and gave medicine after asking my preferences and checking my entire file for previous problems. He was very patient and heard the entire problem in detail. *** ******** ***** ** *********** ** ********* *** ** *********** **** ***** ********** ** ********* *** *************

tags: None
review: Highly courteous. Always greets the patients with a smile. Pays lot of personalized attention to patients. Highly interactive and makes the patient feel at home. Over all, an extremely competent and thorough professional who loves his job as well as his patients. Have no hesitation in recommending Dr. Chandrasekar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Chandrasekar is ground to earth. He will clarify all the doubts. His team also very friendly. They explained each and everything. My mom was recovered very fast after knee replacement. I will recommend everyone to consult multiple doctor before going for knee replacement and keep Dr Chandrasekar in that list.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr is very patient in understanding the problem and explained in detail the course of action that needs to be taken in the form of medicines as well as lifestyle changes in the form of daily exercises as well as food habits. In short, a pretty helpful dr with good coordinating staff all around in People Tree hospital

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Chandrasekar is very friendly and listens to the patients problem patiently. I am still in the early stage of my treatment but so far everything went very well and I am satisfied with the investigations being carried out to help me solve my health problem. I would like to thank Chandrasekar for his kind help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The doctor really cares for the patients. Have been referring to him for last few years and every time he surpasses my expectations with his concern* ** ** ** *************, yet so humble. I am so comfortable with all the doctors and staff at People Tree Hospital. The culture of this hospital is focused only on the patients welfare. They are not like other hospitals.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is not my first visit to this doctor, I was treated years back for my femur fracture. Only one thing I would say is, am able to walk normally today is because of him. 
The story started when I met with an accident in 2006 and treated locally in my home town placing a rod in my multiple fractured femur which was a major failure leading to broken rod in the femur after 3 years in 2009. Only hope that time when I was told by other doctors that I will get leg shortening due to bone trimming is him. Now I am a proud mother of 2 kids.

tags: None

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********* ********* ** **** Special thanks to Dr. C and Dr. RaviPrakash for all the support. The supporting staff (Lakshmi and Amrutha, in particular) very helpful and were available at all times for any help. The wait time at the billing counters can be improved

tags: None
review: Very good. Even though my operation was done at a different hospital by a different doctor, he listened to my problem in detail and very patiently tried to solve my problem. Medicine he prescribed helped lessen my knee pain. Every time I visited him for the follow up, he  showed the same patience and interest as the first time. He also got all the necessary investigation done and referred me to a pain management doctor. I would definitely recommend this doctor to others.

tags: None
review: Though we never got to meet the Doctor as he was in the OT, he sent another great doctor right around the time of our appointment. It was quite a delightful experience - both experience with the new doctor and being in a hospital which seemed to care about patients as paying customers - who have other choices of hospitals. I think People tree has great future and I highly recommend the Hospital for this world-class customer focus environment - and off course Great Doctors!
